title: Christmas Event 2016
body: Does anybody know when the Snow down Showdown event is coming in 2016? And when the new winter skins are coming out? e.g. Santa Braum, Winter Wonder Karma and Snow Day Graves.

replies.body:
Hey mate sorry to bug you. Is there any chance you can take a look at the below? 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/zetx3QbR-league-website-problems
Not grabbing any of the skins this year. If anything I might pick up one of the old ones.

I am curious to when these will be released as well.
I thought It would be the beginning of December.
I don't know, but I am hoping next patch!
In the patch 6.24 notes they said that they would be released during patch 6.24 but I don't know when during patch 6.24. That's what I'm curious about.

If Riot had any common sense, they'd be available 1/12.

On the other hand, Riot has no common sense - they release the Halloween skins after Halloween last year.
